modName: Berts Bits And Bobs Resources For Modders
summary: Some bits & pieces I've made either for myself or others!
descriptionHtml:
Bert's Bits And Bobs

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

LATEST
Pertaining to Steam Workshop paid for mods, no resources may be used in mods that are charged for.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CHECK TUTORIAL LINKS BELOW OR CLICK PICTURES IN THE DOWNLOAD TAB FOR SCRIPT USAGE/TUTORIALS IF AVAILABLE.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Scripts come with a link to a full tutorial on implementation and textures & nifs are, well, pretty self-explanatory!

Each package is NMM compatible so you can just install as if it's a standard mod for instant use in the CK.

It is [u]HIGHLY[/u] recommended that you BSA your mod's resources before distribution else conflicts could arise!!

If you use these resources, please, credit where it's due and send me a link to put on the page for other modders to check things out in-game before deciding whether to use them or not.

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

[u]Scripts[/u]

For Sale, Sold! - [url=http://bertscktutorial.ucoz.com/index/for_sale_sold/0-19]Tutorial[/url] - A script for making an interactive For Sale sign for your house mod to avoid messing with the steward.

Basic Version used in Aspen Manor by gentester (Coming Soon)

Advanced Version used in my own mod - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36372//?]Wild Mountain Dairy Farm[/url]

---------------------------------------------------------

Adding To Levelled Lists The Easy, Safe Way! - [url=http://bertscktutorial.ucoz.com/index/adding_to_leveled_lists_the_easy_safe_way/0-20]Tutorial[/url] - For adding to levelled list during run-time to avoid overwriting them!

Basic Version used in my own mod - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36372//?]Wild Mountain Dairy Farm[/url]

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

[u]Meshes[/u]

New Silverware - Fork, Spoon, Knife, Cup & Square Platter

Fully Collisioned, Free-Standing Stairs - No Stutter Guaranteed!

Trinkets Pillars - For Storing All Those Trinkets You Keep Finding!

Crates Of Stuff - Potions, Poisons & Scrolls Crates. When Space Is Limited, Use A Crate!

Rocking Horse Container - For The Kid Who Has Everything, Somewhere To Put It All!

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

[u]Combo's[/u]

[url=http://bertscktutorial.ucoz.com/index/self_refilling_food_displays/0-30]Tutorial[/url] - Self Refilling Food Display Pack
Includes all vanilla AND Hearthfire foods fixed to be static and 3 scripts for foods to be replaced from house stores when taken and a message saying how many are left.

Mask-Bust Pack - UPDATED
Includes the original 4 New Busts For Displaying All The Vanilla & Dragonborn Masks!
Plus 2 all new sets of busts, Skull-Busts & Crystal-Busts and 2 versions of the scripts, an updated of the original which now uses a Global Variable so the game won't forget you've placed a mask if you are away for over 31 game-days and a new V2 that needs neither Global Variable nor trigger/activator!
IMPORTANT - CHECK THE TUTORIAL FOR IMPLEMENTING NEW SCRIPTS!!!!
[url=http://bertscktutorial.ucoz.com/index/mask_busts_safe_sound/0-26]Tutorial For Updated Original Scripts[/url]
[url=http://bertscktutorial.ucoz.com/index/mask_bust_scripts_v2/0-29]Tutorial For Version 2 Scripts[/url]

[center]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center]

berticus0001

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
